text: @Alyssa_Milano @realDonaldTrump I hear this and am enraged. Mr. President, please don't call everything that happens to you a HOAX! First off, it's in the history books that you were IMPEACHED! NO HOAX. You weren't removed from office. Next, I work in healthcare and can tell you that COVID-19 is NOT A HOAX!
